Activity: Wake up with Friday vibes! Log into the EHR system and check for any critical alerts or messages. Get that caffeine flowing!
Review the patient schedule and prioritize influenza symptom assessments. Ensure all assessment tools are readily available.
First patient assessment. Greet them with a warm smile and conduct the assessment following the EHR-integrated protocols.
Accurately and completely enter the patient's information into the EHR. Validate all required fields are populated.
More patients! Time to perform more influenza assessment.
Document data into the EHR. Make sure everything is well-documented!
Take a quick break to stretch and grab a snack. Recharge for the rest of the day.
Patient assessment and EHR Documentation.
Patient data entry. Confirm the accuracy.
Time for Lunch! Enjoy the last lunch for the week!
Continue patient interactions.
EHR data entry! Finishing the job.
More patient interactions.
Document data in the EHR.
Patient Assessment.
EHR Documentation.
Send email to @Clinlead-1 to summarize influenza cases. Subject: Summary of influenza cases
Review all EHR entries for the week, ensuring accuracy and completeness. Address any outstanding issues or discrepancies.
Prepare for the weekend. Yippee!!
Clock out and celebrate the end of the week! Time for some weekend fun!
